title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Casino Story and Work Missions
content:
Fight off the Duggan family’s hostile takeover of The Diamond Casino & Resort in Casino Story Missions and earn Double Rewards this week. Master Penthouse owners can access these missions by visiting Agatha Baker’s office inside The Diamond, or via the Jobs section of the Pause Menu for a second go round once they’ve all been completed.

Call up Ms. Baker to request Casino Work Missions to help with forward-facing operations, recover stolen assets, and other assignments for a doubled payday.
